snippet.title: Robot Wars: Metal Mayhem - Game Boy Color Gameplay
snippet.description:
Based on the BBC show, this game was developed by Tiertex, known for their work on the computer ports of Street Fighter 1, Game Boy and Game Boy Color ports of Toy Story 1, 2 and Racer, and most infamously... Human Killing Machine, an unofficial "sequel" to their SF1 port. Considering their poor quality of their games, it's no surprise this game fell of the radar, even by Europe-only game standards. This video showcases every game mode it has to offer.

Robot Wars (C) Robot Wars, Ltd., Mentor Barraclough Carey Productions Ltd.
Metal Mayhem game (C) BBC Worldwide Ltd.
